For what it's worth, I think that fossilized frameworks are really a 
good thing, provided people really know that it is fossilized.

I wrote this up to explain why a long time ago: 
http://www.artima.com/weblogs/viewpost.jsp?thread=8826



Michael Feathers
author, Working Effectively with Legacy Code
www.objectmentor.com
